name: Fuxi Dragon
description: $FUXI token glorifies a legendary Chinese cultural hero and demigod, symbolizing the connection to nature and the divine. As a half-human, half-dragon figure, $FUXI embodies the balance between nature and humanity, inspiring reverence and admiration. His wisdom bridged the gap between heaven, earth, and humanity, making him a divine teacher.
